Html:
I created a update package for Adobe Flash Player 32-bit/64-bit Plugin 18.0.0.209 released this week and deployed it to some client computers. On creating the package I followed the procedure the pdf manual in the documentation section of this site. Then I tried to search any update at the client computer but couldn't find any update. Next I check updated plugins with Firefox, it says Adobe Flash Player is old(18.0.0.203, which I also installed with WSUS successfully). WSUS packager says the update is "not installed" to the computer. I have tried detect and report to two computers for several times but results were same.

What should I try next time?

*My environment
Client Computers: Windows 7 Enterprise & Professional SP1
Server OS: Windows 2008 R2 Standard
WSUS: 3.2.7600.226
WSUS Packager: 1.3.1504.15

*Package XML
<?xml version="1.0"?>

-<sdp:SoftwareDistributionPackage SchemaVersion="1.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:drv="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/Installers/WindowsDriver.xsd" xmlns:usp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/UpdateServicesPackage.xsd" xmlns:uei="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/Installers/UpdateExeInstallation.xsd" xmlns:sdp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/SoftwareDistributionPackage.xsd" xmlns:msp="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/Installers/MspInstallation.xsd" xmlns:msiar="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/MsiApplicabilityRules.xsd" xmlns:msi="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/Installers/MsiInstallation.xsd" xmlns:lar="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/LogicalApplicabilityRules.xsd" xmlns:cmd="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/Installers/CommandLineInstallation.xsd" xmlns:bt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/BaseTypes.xsd" xmlns:bar="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wsus/2005/04/CorporatePublishing/BaseApplicabilityRules.xsd" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">

<sdp:MoreInfoUrl>http://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/flash-player/apsb15-18.html>
